name: David LUCIER et al. v. Robert J. WARD et al.

parties: David LUCIER et al. v. Robert J. WARD et al.

opinions.text:
ORDER
The petition for writ of certiorari is denied.

attorneys: Revens & DeLuca, Ltd., Kevin M. Hayes, Warwick, for petitioners.
Frederick N. Costello, Asst. City Sol, Petrarca & McGair, Louis A. Petrarca, Jr., Warwick, for intervenors.
casebody.head_matter:
David LUCIER et al. v. Robert J. WARD et al.
No. 82-509-M.P.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
Jan. 6, 1983.
Revens & DeLuca, Ltd., Kevin M. Hayes, Warwick, for petitioners.
Frederick N. Costello, Asst. City Sol, Petrarca & McGair, Louis A. Petrarca, Jr., Warwick, for intervenors.
